name: Doohickey Research District
desc: Doohickey's research and specialty items are developed and produced here. A small number of those can be adquired - for a price.

name: Silly Research Park
desc: A massive research complex (for post-collapse standards) stands in this planet. Varied experiments with Silly Particles are conducted here, it's results quickly shipped to the marketing and sales department. This state of the art facility provides a great amount of exotic and advanced weaponry and hulls.

name: Orbital Station - Silly
desc:
A silly space station, featuring gunside and phase modules.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.

name: Battlestation - Silly
desc:
A silly battlestation, featuring shields and phase modules.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.

name: Silly Particles Refinery
desc: Specialized facilities interlinked and prepared to handle the exotic nature of Silly Particles. This plant processes the substance into a more refined and powerful version known as Refined Silly Particles. Security and qualified personnel are required to run this expensive industry.
